2428401.name: Tantalizing Aromas
2428401.desc: You're taking a leisurely stroll when a familiar aroma fills your nostrils. You follow the tantalizing smell and discover that it's from a bakery you used to visit often. May as well buy some bread!

2428402.name: Now's My Chance
2428402.desc: There is no one in line outside Domini's at the moment. This is an excellent opportunity to try their Molander Hazelnut Millefeuille set without a prior reservation!

2428403.name: Half-Off Promo
2428403.desc: There's a half-off promo at a drinks place you've been to. Why not get some beverages for everyone?

2428404.name: Courtyard Artist
2428404.desc: The Saint Sophia Medical Center courtyard is covered in golden osmanthus flowers. What kind of pattern should you make...?

2428405.name: Seashells by the Seashore
2428405.desc: The waves gently lap at the shore, and your feet are snug in the soft sand. You gently pick up some sea shells and put them in your pocket.

2428406.name: Safe Landing
2428406.desc: The new tech who was repairing the roof has found himself suspended in mid air by accident. Help him reach the ground safely.

2428407.name: Reader's Fatigue
2428407.desc: A group of students, all wearing smiles on their faces, have walked into the Molander Library. Since they have nothing else to do, they might as well go and read some books together.

2428408.name: An Alarm
2428408.desc: Another alarm has sounded on the watch, and the Spatial Collapse Warning Factor continues to climb. It's time to go to the Data Plane Layer.
